system.description:
At 6th level, your command over your magic becomes more precise, and you are able to assert more control over it. Choose one of the following:

 

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.ksqelz0npkhv9mzp]{Refinement: Deep Font}

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.i66t5lr9pnp40h7y]{Refinement (Patient Aptitude)}

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.rwxhjzycmi8stro5]{Refinement (Prodigious Innovator)}
